description: This file defines the DeliveryHistoryScreen widget for a Flutter application, displaying delivery history details, including a header and placeholder entries, with role-based authorization logic.

classes.name: DeliveryHistoryScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the delivery history screen, with role-based access control.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A widget displaying the header of the delivery history page with a gradient background and icon.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A widget representing a single row item in the delivery history list, styled with shadow and icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the DeliveryHistoryScreen, including access control and list of placeholders.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the header section of the delivery history page.

methods.name: _Row.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for a single placeholder row in the delivery history list.
